item.name: Simultaneous Vi Mode
item.item:
What's Simultaneous Vi Mode? Push S and D keys simultaneously and keep them pressing. Then you can use Vi style navigation by HJKL. - HJKL to Left/Down/Up/Right notsave.simultaneouskeypresses_vimode
